title: [RESOLVED] Server Issues - 28th Jan 2015
body:
Hi all,

We're aware of some server issues that may be impacting your ability to start / connect to games.  We've disabled ranked as a precaution, and we are looking into it.  I'll post updates as soon as I have them.

Main announcement thread will be updated here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/zcrEGeXl-server-issues-28th-jan-2015

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body: I can't connect to the game. Will I be punished for this?
